name: activepieces
tagline: A self-hosted workflow automation platform for building integrations with visual logic
description: Activepieces is an open-source, no-code workflow automation platform that lets teams build automations and AI workflows with drag-and-drop logic. Users can self-host or use the cloud version, and integrate with 400+ apps to automate business workflows.

features.title: Workflow Automation
features.description: Automates tasks by connecting applications through trigger and action flows

features.title: No-Code Builder
features.description: Allows workflows to be created using a visual editor

features.title: Application Integrations
features.description: Supports connections to third-party services through predefined pieces

features.title: Self-Hosted Execution
features.description: Runs automation workflows on user-managed infrastructure

features.title: Scheduled Triggers
features.description: Executes workflows based on time-based schedules
